item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

7. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (316 points | 92 comments)

27. UpCodes (YC S17) Is Hiring a Marketing Leader ( | hide)

29. Contextual Retrieval (279 points | 67 comments)
